sentence.Network_en: To live together harmoniously as men and women is an achievement.
sentence.Network_cn: 夫妻能和睦相处就是一种成就。

sentence.Network_en: The idea that the United States could harmoniously accommodate all was a fiction.
sentence.Network_cn: 认为美国可以接纳所有的人，使之和谐相处是一个幻想。

sentence.Network_en: The president and Stevenson had worked harmoniously over the last eighteen months.
sentence.Network_cn: 在过去一年半里,总统和史蒂文森一起工作是融洽的.

list.abs: 和两会有关的英文单词_百度知道 ... monetary policy 货币政策 social harmony 社会和谐 mutual support 相互支持.
英语单词翻译 ... careful consideration 深思熟虑 perfect harmony 水乳交融 feed on fancies 画饼充饥/画梅止渴.

entry.tran: （关系、协定、讨论）融洽的，和睦的，友好的
entry.def: A harmonious relationship, agreement, or discussion is friendly and peaceful.

example.ex: Their harmonious relationship resulted in part from their similar goals...
example.tran: 他们关系融洽的部分原因是他们有着相似的目标。

example.ex: It is a harmonious community where pupils are happy and industrious.
example.tran: 这是一个和睦的集体，学生们开心玩耍，用功读书。

entry.def: Something that is harmonious has parts which go well together and which are in proportion to each other.

example.ex: The architecture is harmonious and no building is over five or six floors high.
example.tran: 这里的建筑风格和谐统一，没有哪座楼房高于五六层。

example.ex: ...a harmonious balance of mind, body, and spirit.
example.tran: 头脑、身体和心灵的协调

entry.def: Musical notes that are harmonious produce a pleasant sound when played together.

example.ex: ...the mysterious skill involved in producing harmonious sounds.
example.tran: 发出悦耳声音的神秘技巧

sentences.sentence: "the problem of absorbing immigrants harmoniously into British society is as important to the immigrants as to the British"

auth_sentence.content: Facts and the word of God can harmoniously co-exist.
auth_sentence.res_content: Facts and the word of God can harmoniously co-exist.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Facts and the word of God can harmoniously co-exist.

auth_sentence.content: Music hall and social realism coexisted harmoniously at the commercial end of British psych-pop.
auth_sentence.res_content: Music hall and social realism coexisted harmoniously at the commercial end of British psych-pop.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Music hall and social realism coexisted harmoniously at the commercial end of British psych-pop.

auth_sentence.content: But in the same speech, he also urged the cardinals to act harmoniously, "like an orchestra" in guiding the Church.
auth_sentence.res_content: But in the same speech, he also urged the cardinals to act harmoniously, "like an orchestra" in guiding the Church.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But in the same speech, he also urged the cardinals to act harmoniously, "like an orchestra" in guiding the Church.

sentences.en: the need to live as harmoniously as possible with everyone else
sentences.cn: 与每个人尽可能和睦相处的必要
